name: Flight Rising: Highlight Swipp & Baldwin Items Alt
description: NotN items- Purple Swipp Apparel- Grey Blue Swipp Familiars- Light Pink Swipp Skins/Accents- Turquoise Swipp Vistas- Dark Orange Swipp Misc- Gold Swipp Multi-Use Items- Grey Baldwin Items- Lavender Baldwin Transmute Materials- Light Green Swipp AND Baldwin share items- Olive Green This is an edit of the script Flight Rising: Highlight Swipp & Baldwin Items v2 that is being maintained by Zoga.
additional_info: Up to date as of 9/14/2017 Last added: Baldwin golem familiars and Swipp crafty birds NotN Items- Purple Holiday Currency- Magenta Swipp Apparel- Grey Blue Swipp Familiars- Light Pink Swipp Skins/Accents- Turquoise Swipp Vistas- Dark Orange Swipp Misc- Gold Swipp Multi-Use Items- Grey Baldwin Items- Lavender Baldwin Transmute Materials- Light Green Swipp AND Baldwin share items- Olive Green Everything is organized by Apparel, Vista, Familiar, Skins/Accents, Misc, and transmutables. Baldwin's items are commented out into sections based on item type in case you want to add your own background color to each section. If an item appears in multiple areas, whatever the LAST line of code it appears in will be the color used. If you don't want that item to be that color, search the item in the code and either remove the line or comment it out using the / and * you can see throughout the code (makes the text orange and mutes that code from working until the comment is removed).
css:

/* Based off Style by that is being maintained by Zoga https://userstyles.org/users/331258, which you can find here https://userstyles.org/styles/136807/flight-rising-highlight-swipp-baldwin-items-v2, originally made by FRScriptUser27: https://userstyles.org/users/293269 that you can find here: https://userstyles.org/styles/115035/flight-rising-highlight-swipp-baldwin-items */

discussions.name: Some of the colors you've used are hard to see.
